name: Plutus Capital
overview: Plutus is a Merchant Bank focused on client relationships. Our devotion to our clients, rather than merely to transactions, separates us from the pack. Plutus is armed with strategies for the ever-changing capital markets and represents a new era of investment banks. Plutus Capital Partners is a Merchant Bank focused on partnering with business owners and management teams to provide capital and advisory services throughout all stages of a firm’s life. To fully support clients, we provide merchant banking services including financings and investments as well as advisory services on mergers, acquisitions, divestitures, restructurings, partnerships and other strategic transactions. The Firm was founded on the belief that there is an opportunity in the financial services market for a company to align itself with clients rather than merely focus on one-off transactions. We maintain a standard of excellence with hands-on participation in all projects that we undertake. The investment and advisory professionals at Plutus come from diverse backgrounds in private equity, investment banking, and entrepreneurship, each bringing sector expertise and a broad network of contacts to the firm and to our partners.
